reviewsJson.markdown:
Setup: SXK Hadaly Clone, 22ga ss316l 10 wrap with cellucotton wick

Testing: Inawera Donald Bubblegum 1.5% 70/30 1.5mg

Flavor Description: This to me is a regular old gumball, like from the machines at the store. Dry, but not too dry, a bit chalky, with some moisture on the exhale. I think this nails the gumball flavor, but I would use closer to 2.5%. 

Off Flavors: none

Throat Hit: none

Uses and pairings: I'm not convinced that this by itself is a complete bubblegum flavor, as i think it needs more of a double bubble chalky but juicy flavor. I would pair this with other bubblegums (I use it with Bubblegum YC) and fruits. Maybe add a cream in to smooth it out but I don't think that's necessary, it's just the only other thing i could think to do.

Second Opinions: none that i could find on here.
reviewsJson.author: [deleted]
reviewsJson.title: Donald Bubblegum
